author: daniellehrner
content:
We are testing 60M gas on Sepolia, right now we are at 54M already.

In general we should always use a testnet first to test it before doing such things on mainnet. Otherwise we risk to lose our 100% uptime.

author: n0price
content: I don't remember how we can migrate 0x01 withdrawal address to 0x02? and how

author: n0price
content:
The account of the withdrawal address and PK of withdrawal address correct? 
```
ethereal validator compound \
--allow-insecure-connections \
--network=$NETWORK \
--connection=$EL_CONNECTION \
--consensus-connection=$CL_CONNECTION \
--validator=$VALIDATOR \
--from=$ACCOUNT \
--privatekey=$PK
```
